{"step_by_step_thinking": "High copper amalgam alloy is known for its improved properties compared to traditional amalgam alloys. Let's go through each option to determine which one is a characteristic feature of high copper amalgam alloy. 

A. Low compressive strength: High copper amalgam alloy actually has higher compressive strength compared to traditional amalgam alloys, so this is not a characteristic feature. 

B. High marginal breakdown: High copper amalgam alloy has improved marginal integrity and resistance to marginal breakdown, so this is not a characteristic feature. 

C. Less marginal #: High copper amalgam alloy has better marginal adaptation and less marginal leakage, so this is a characteristic feature. 

D. High creep: High copper amalgam alloy has reduced creep and better dimensional stability, so this is not a characteristic feature. 

Based on the above analysis, the characteristic feature of high copper amalgam alloy is less marginal #.", "answer_choice": "C"}
